TextView.android:text: In Chance, polling is used to ensure fair and transparent selection when the number of applicants exceeds the available event slots. After the registration period closes, all eligible participants are entered into an automated random draw that assigns confirmed spots and generates a ranked waiting list. Users selected in the poll will receive a notification through the app, along with a deadline to confirm their attendance. If a selected user does not respond in time or chooses to withdraw, their spot is automatically offered to the next person on the waiting list. This process helps maintain equal opportunity for all entrants while keeping event capacity efficiently managed.
